content: Oct 2 Everest Re Group Ltd said its Dublin-based unit had received approval from the Central Bank of Ireland to become a non-life insurer  allowing it to operate in the European Union under a single regulatory framework.

title: Everest Re gets Irish central bank nod for EU subsidiary
